title: Emulate Bad Data Connection - v2.0
body: I suggest to create another option that alternates "lost of signal" and "bad signal". Create an infinite loop that breakes the connection in a random time. From 1 to 10 sec, for example.

comments.body: My signal strength varies and connection loss issues so having a tool like this would be beneficial for working out of my home.
It's a must have to simulate the **** 1G signal here in the 3rd world

Please do this!
Create an option to simulate bad signal of GPS too.
